name: Ultrabugs (itch)
description:
UltraBugs is a tactical turn-based game built for the Game Off 2021 game jam with LÖVE.

Manage a squad of three space marines as they venture inside the giant bug colony and defeat their queen at level seven.

Source code available at github.com

Controls

The game can be played with mouse and keyboard and the following hotkeys:

KEYDESCRIPTIONspace
End turn1Switch to movement mode2Switch to shooting mode3Switch to melee mode Attribution
  • Font Gravity by John Watson
  • Font Vermin Vibes 1989 by Chequered Ink
  • Font Minecraft by Craftron Gaming
